1.content:
Somewhere, in another dimension, legendary pokemon had gather around for an important meeting. The legendary Arceus then appears before.

"Listen everyone. It has brought to my attention that I have find five humans with pure hearts who have care for pokemon very well" said Arceus.

"I thought there were no pure hearted humans left" said Lugia. "It seems we have found the last five humans who have pure hearts" said Arceus.

"What would you like us to do with them?" Ho-oh ask. "As you know. Most of us legendary pokemon allow humans to capture us and join them on their journey. However I have something different for them. I would like you other pokemon to find these humans" said Arceus.

"What would you like us to do with them?" Entei ask. "Do whatever you want with them. You can make them your playmates. Make them into your species and have them take your place as the new legendary pokemon. Or you can make them your mates and have them live with you for the rest of your lives. Now go my children and I shall watch your progress from here"

All the legendary pokemon where then gone to find the five humans with pure hearts. Now which human finds these legendary pokemon first
1.title: Legendary meeting

11.content: Which legendary meets with Damon?
11.title: Damon

111.content:
Mew was know to be a playful legendary pokemon. When she heard of one of the humans had a pure heart. Mew decided to find one of the humans and plays with them and maybe make one of them her new matw. Mew always another Mew to play with. A few minuets later. Mew finds one of the humans who was at home sleeping.

"There's one of them. He sure is handsome and cute. I'll have fun with him" Mew removes his blanket and lifts him up in the air. Damon starts to wake up and finds himself floating. "W-what the? Am I still dreaming?" Mew just giggle.. "It's not a dream silly. I'm lifting you up with my psychic powers" Damon then sees Mew.

"Whoa a Mew in my room" said Damon. "Want to play human?" Mew ask. "Sure I guess. What should we play first?"said Damon. "First I need to change you to make the game fair" Mew use her powers and changes Damon into
111.title: Mew

choices: Damon changes into a fire type pokemon
Something goes wrong with the transformation
112.content:
Entei went out to look for the five humans who had pure hearts. He decided to make one of the humans into his servant.

He eventually finds one. Entei finds Damon. "That must be the human that Arceus was talking. He will make a perfect servant for me"

Damon was just taking his break from his travels. He was about to head out to the next region and take on the gyms there and the elite four as well.

Before he could enjoy his break though. Entei jumps out and let's out a mighty roar. Damon jump after Entei appear before him.

"Whoa Entei a legendary pokemon" Damon was about to call one of his pokemon out to battle. But Entei knocks him down and pins him to the ground.

Damon was pin down and was unable to move. "Do not be alarm, human, I'm not here to hurt you" Entei said to Damon as he removes his paw from him.

Damon then get's back on his feet. "Your not? But you attack me" said Damon. "I do apologize. I have heard you had a pure heart and want to make you my servant" said Entei.

"Your servant?" said Damon. "Yes a human who will serve me. You'll make a perfect servant, for me, if you accept I'll change you into a powerful fire type pokemon" said Entei

"If I refuse?" Damon ask. "You can't" said Entei. "What do you mean?" Damon ask. "Even if you do refuse. I will still change you into a fire type pokemon and make you my servant" said Entei.

"Then I better leave" Damon tries to run for it. But Entei stops him. "Like I said. You can't refuse. I'm going to make you my servant no matter what"

Entei launch a flamethrower attack on Damon. Damon embraces for the worst. But it didn't hurt him. Instead it begins to change him instead
112.title: Entei's servant

1151.content:
There was only one thing Virizion wanted and that is a mate. She didn't want to be alone anymore and find a nice male Virizion to be with.

After hearing about five humans with pure hearts. Virizion decided to find one of the humans and wonders if the human was worthy to be her mate.

A few minuets later. Virizion finds one of the humans with a pure heart. It was a young male human, name Damon and Virizion get's a good look at him.

"Arceus was right. He has a pure heart" She then finds herself blushing. "He will make a perfect mate for me. I'll just have to approach carefully"

Damon has gone on a long journey and became the pokemon champion. He got a letter, from one of friends, to meet at Hearthome city for a little reunion.

Damon was on his way there and decided to rest up near a lake. He then goes up to the lake and get's a sip of water from his hands.

When he stop drinking. Damon saw Virizion, in the lakes, reflection, standing behind him. Damon slowly turns around and see's Virizion.

"Hello human" said Virizion. Damon was surprise. "A wild pokemon and it talk to me" He then tries to run for it, and tries to grab his bag and his pokemon.

But Virizion was too fast for him and stops him. "Please don't be scare. I'm not going to hurt you" Damon then felt a little calm and a little confuse.

"Your not?" Damon ask. "No instead I want to award you. My name is Virizion and I can sense that your heart is pure and I want to award you" said Virizion.

"Award me huh? What is it?" said Damon. "How would you feel if I change you into a strong pokemon" said Virizion. Damon felt excited.

"That would be awesome. I always wanted to know what it would be like to be a pokemon" said Damon. "Glad to hear that. What is your name?" Virizion ask.

"Damon. My name is Damon" said Damon. "Okay Damon. Please stand still while I change you into a very strong pokemon"

Virizion then concentrate her powers on Damon and tries to change him into a strong handsome looking Virizion. But does he change into a Virizion or into another pokemon? Does she change him into a grass or fighting type pokemon
1151.title: Virizion

choices: I want you to be my mate
A legendary finds the two Virizion
11511.content:
Virizion starts to use more of her power. All she wants is a male handsome Virizion and make him her mate. She was going to do that to Damon.

Damon's body starts to grow green fur. His hands and feet then begins to shift into his new black hooves as he felt his spine shift and was now on four legs.

Long curly horns then appears on the side of his head. His face then changes into his new pointy snout as his changes continue.

A black then appears running from his to the back of his head. His lower legs then begins to change to resemble knee high boots.

Pink tip leafs then appears on the side of his head. Leafy tuffs of fur then appears on his shoulders. Pointed tuffs of fur then appears, on his back, to form a medium size tail.

A few changes later and Damon was now a male Virizion. Damon looks over his new powerful body and he then looks at Virizion.

"Virizion I look like you" said Damon. Virizion smile. "Yes Damon. I think you would look great as a Virizion like me. Do you like it?" She ask.

"Like it? I love it. Thank you Virizion for this new body. I have to show my friends this" said Damon as he was about to leave.

"Wait Damon. There's something I must tell you" Damon looks at Virizion. "What?" Virizion then comes closer and closer to Damon.

"Don't you want to know why I change you into my species?" She ask. "I guess so. Tell me why you change me into a Virizion" said Damon

"I change you into my species because
11511.title: A mate for Virizion.

choices: Damon makes it to Hearthome City
115111.content:
"I want you to be my mate Damon. That is why I change you into a Virizion like me" said Virizion. "That's the reason you change me into your species? You want me as a mate?" Damon ask.

"Yes my love. I've been lonely, for a long time, and I always wanted another Virizion to be my mate. But I'm the only one of my kind until I've heard you got a pure heart"

She was then closer to Damon. "How about it Damon? Will you become my mate?" She ask. "Well gosh Virizion I don't know what to say" said Damon.

"If you accept I'll let you keep your new form" said Virizion. "I don't know Virizion. We've just met and I don't know if I want to become your mate and give up my human life" said Damon.

"Maybe this will change your mind" Virizion then planted a surprise kiss on Damon's lips. Damon starts to blush and couldn't help but kiss back"

They then stop kissing. "I'll let you decided then. When you decided if you want to be my mate, or not, I'll come find you and see if you made your decision or not"

Virizion then left. Damon just stood there as new feelings starts to come in. He was starting to like Virizion. He then remember he had to meet his friends and heads to Hearthome City.

"Just wait until my friends see my new body" said Damon
115111.title: I want you to be my mate

11512.content: Thinking deeply, Virizion realizes that Damon may has a pure heart but he don't seems to be her type for been her mate. So instead, she decides to just gift Damon by changing him into a grass type legendary...
11512.title: A grass type.

choices: Damon then goes to his friends
115121.content:
Damon's body then begins to turn green. His feet then become toeless and his hands now only had three fingers on them.

His head then becomes round as it comes to a curved point. His eyes then becomes large baby blue eyes with thick black rings around them.

He then grew smaller. Clear wings then comes out from his back. Green antennaes, with blue tips, then appears on his head.

A few changes later and Damon was now a Celebi. Damon looks over his new body. "I'm a Celebi. I've been change into a Celebi" said Damon.

"You like it Damon? I figure I change you into a cute legendary pokemon" said Virizion. "It feels very weird of being change into a pokemon" said Damon.

"I'm sure you'll get use to it" said Virizion. He then notice the wings on his back and tries out flying. It felt very good to fly around.

"I can fly. This is awesome" Damon said with glee. "Glad to see your enjoying it" said Virizion. "Virizion if I'm a Celebi. Does that mean I have the ability to time travel?" Damon ask her.

"What makes you think that?" said Virizion. "Well I've heard that a Celebi has the ability to travel back through time like they can travel to the future or the past" said Damon.

"Yes Damon. You have the ability to time travel. But I want you to be careful with that ability and try not to change the past. Otherwise it will change the future" said Virizion.

"Why would I change the past? I can't think of anything of why I want to change the past" said Damon. "That's good to hear. I must go now. Enjoy your new body"

Virizion then left as Damon tries out his new form
115121.title: Celebi

choices: Virizion tells him where to find some
115122.content:
Damon's body begins to turn white as green grass like fur appears on his back. His hands and feet then begins to morph into his new paws.

He then felt a sudden shift in his hips as he falls on four legs. Damon then begins to grow smaller and smaller as he was now very small and shrank into his clothes.

A pink flower, with two leaves, then appears on each side of his head. His face then changes into his new cute muzzle as his eyes turn green.

Several gracidea flowers then appears on his back. Damon then comes out of his clothes and he was now a cute land forme Shaymin.

"Why is everything so big?" said Damon. Virizion just smile. "I have change you into a Shaymin" said Virizion. "A Shaymin? I'm a Shaymin?"

Damon has heard about Shaymin before and always wanted to capture one. He didn't expect to be change into one by a legendary pokemon.

"I hope you enjoy your gift along with your new body" Virizion was about to leave. "Wait what am I going to do now? I have to meet up with my friends later" said Damon.

"Then you should meet up with your friends then. Although it might be hard to understand what your saying now that your a pokemon now" said Virizion.

"Yeah but it will be hard to get to them in my small form" said Damon. "You do have a sky forme as well. You can get to your friends that way" said Virizion.

"How do I change into my sky forme then?" Damon ask. "You need to find some Gracidea flowers if you want to change into your sky forme" said Virizion.

"Where can I find some?" said Damon.
115122.title: Shaymin

choices: One of Damon's pokemon come out!
It was a empty poke ball and get captured by himself. *Facepalm*
1151222.content:
"I'm so sorry, Damon. I don't know where it could being found." Virizion replies.

"Great, how am I suppose to get that flower if you don't know." said Damon who began to get upset. "And I really have to meet with my friends, they surely must waiting for me, now."

"Well you have your pokemon with you, right?" said Virizion. Damon come to his mind, looks at his pile of clothes on the floor that he wear early and realizes she's rights.

"Oh!... Yeah... I completely forgot..." said Damon. He would does a facepalm if he could.

"Well I guess you will being alright." said Virizion. She decides to stay and see if he needs help as she watchs the little Shaymin goes to his pile of clothes to get his pokeballs.

Damon has much difficult to get his pokemons with his new small form. He gots at least one and tries his best to open it. When he holds the poke ball with his two fronts paws, he accidentally hits the poke ball and the poke ball grows cause Damon to falls on his back. Virizion giggles a little as Damon struggles to get on his paws but had difficult and he's not amused. She helps him to get on his paws, Damon goes back on the poke ball, hits it once more and poke ball opens! And...
1151222.title: Virizion doesn't know

11512221.content:
One of Damon's pokemon then came out. It was his Lucario that came out. He had raise Lucario when it was still an egg. Lucario looks around for his trainer. "Master where are you?" Lucario begins to ask. "I'm down here Lucario" Lucario then looks down and sees the little Sharman that use to be his teainer. Lucario looks at him.

"Master what has happened to you?"Lucario ask him. "I'll tell you later. Help me get the rest of my pokemon out" Lucario nods and helps Damon get the rest of his pokemon out. The rest of his pokemon are a Torterra, Starravia, Luxray, Floatzel and a female Lopunny who was in love with Lucario who Lucario also love as well.

Damon then tells his pokemon what has happened to him and introduce them to Virizion who stay for a while. "So your stuck like that then Master Damon?" His Torterra ask him. "Yes and I'm no longer your trainer. I just want to be your friend" said Damon. "We'll still,be with you Damon even if your no,longer our trainer" said Floatzel.

Damon just smile seeing his pokemon are still loyal to him. "Thanks you guys" Virizion then left after seeing Damon will be fine with his pokemon. Starravia then Flys to,find the flower for Damon. His pokemon then heads out to go see Damon's friend with Damon riding on his Torterras back.
11512221.title: One of Damon's pokemon come out!

11512222.content:
It was an empty poke ball as a red engulfs Damon and sucks him right into the poke ball as it closes. "Oh dear. It seems he capture himself. The poke ball struggle three times before it click. Virizion just sigh. "I might as well help him out of there". Before she could. Virizion sense another trainer and hides in one of the bushes.

The trainer came to Damon's poke ball and grabs it as the trainer walks away. "A trainer took him. I should follow the trainer". Meanwhile Damon finds himself in a empty void. "Wait where am I? The last thing I remember was getting a poke ball and" He then comes to the realization that the poke ball was empty and capture himself.

"I'm inside a pokeball. I capture myself" He wanted to faepalm but couldnt. "So this is what it's like to be in a pokeball then" Suddenly he felt himself being pull out as he was taken out of his pokeball. He looks to see who call him out and it was.
11512222.title: It was a empty poke ball and get captured by hi...

115122222.content:
It was Virizion.

"Damon, are you alright?" ask Virizion.

"I'm fine, Virizion." said Damon. He looks at his poke ball. "Thank you for take me out, it was strange being in a poke ball. But hey! At least, I won't being captured by a another trainer because I am captured by myself!"

"Really?" said Virizion as the little Shaymin nodded. "Interesting..." Virizion thinks. "I never thinking that a pokemon can't being put in a another poke ball once captured."

Then Damon looks around and notice he is in unknown place.

"Hum... Virizion, where are we?" ask Damon as he in the sky and notices its sunset. "And how long I am being in my poke ball?"

Virizion bits her lips. "Well... its a long story..." Virizion tells him about what happened after he's get captured by himself, about a trainer comes and picked his stuffs and how long it took her for recovering him and find a safe place where no human can visit this place. After she is done to explain, Damon sigh.

"Why you didn't take me out sooner possible?" ask Damon with a upset tone.

"I'm sorry, I wanted avoid battle against trainers, because I don't want to be captured by this humans." explain Virizion.

"*sigh* I see..." said Damon who is sad now. Virizion feels bad for him, until it comes to her mind.

"Oh! By the way, I also recover this." she grabs something on her back and drops it front him. Its a belt with five poke balls. "I guess they're yours, right?"

"Yo-you got my pokemons back too." said Damon as she nods. The Shaymin smiles.

"Whoa! Thank you, Virizion!" said Damon.

"You're welcome." reply Virizion. "Allow me to help you..." Then she releases the five pokemons of Damon of their poke balls. (Note: the sixth pokemon is Damon the Shaymin himself. Because you can't carry more than six pokemon in the party.)
115122222.title: Virizion

1151222221.content:
The five of Damon's pokemon the comes out of their pokeballs.

Torterra: Damon's first pokemon that he first started off with when it was a Turtwig. He first got it from Professor Rowan.

Luxray: Damon got Luxray after finding it injure as it was abandoned by its former trainer as Damon takes it in as one of his own.

Staraptor: A pokemon Damon encounter who wanted to become stronger when it was still a Stanly and wanted to evolve into a strong Staraptor.

Floatzel: A pokemon who had always wanted to travel with a pokemon trainer and help him, or her, take on the champion and beat them.

Lucario: Damon first got Lucario when it was still an egg and a Riolu. He got from Riley.

They look around to find their teainer. "Where is our trainer?" Torterra ask. "I'm right here guys" Damon the Sharman then tells them what happen to him and introduce them to Virizion. The pokemon that change him into a Shaymin. "So your now a pokemon master Damon?"said Lcario. "Yes but please don't call me your master. I am no longer your trainer. But I still want to be your friend" said Damon.

"But of course Damon" said Staraptor. "We'll always be your friend. After all you help raise us and we help yoy,defeat the champion" said Floatzel. The little Shaymin smile. "Thanks you guy" said Damon. "So now what do you want to do now Damon?"said Torterra.
1151222221.title: Meet Damon's pokemons

1152.content:
Keldeo has ran off to meet one of the pure hearted humans. He hasn't told his other friends about it.

"I'm going to find these humans and make some friends." In a few minuets. Keldeo finds Damon.

"He must be one of them. Time to make my move." Damon was out camping with his pokemon.

He was going to meet up with one of his friends in the next town. That is when he heard a noise from the bushes.

"Who's there?" Keldeo then slowly approach him. "It's okay human. I'm not here to hurt you." Said Keldeo.

"Who are you?" Damon ask. "I am Keldeo. I came here looking for you." Said Keldeo. "Why?" Said Damon.

Keldeo smile. "I want to make new friends. Would you like to be a pokemon like me?" Keldeo ask.

"Really? Become a pokemon? I always wanted to know what it would be like a pokemon. So yes." Said Damon.

"Thank you. What's your name?" Said Keldeo. "Damon." He replied. "Damon let's get you change."

Keldeo changes Damon. But into what?
1152.title: Keldeo

choices: I don't know Latias. Let me think about it.
11532.content:
Latias had been a lonely dragon/psychic pokemon ever since she lost her brother Latios. She did everything to not be lonely anymore. But nothing work.

After hearing about five humans with pure hearts. Latias decided to go find one and see if the human will become her new mate.

A few minuets later. Latias finds the young human boy Damon. "His heart is very pure. He's very handsome as well. He'll make a perfect mate"

Damon was just heading back home to Twinleaf Town. He wanted to tell his whole family of all the adventures he had and all the pokemon he met.

He decided to take a break and sit's down on a rock. As he was resting. Damon finds himself being hugged by a strange pokemon.

Looking down he see's the pokemon's red arms and claws. Damon fear for his life. He slowly looks behind and finds Latias hugging him.

Damon was surprise, as it surprise Latias, and falls. "Please don't hurt me" said Damon. Latias then use her psychic powers to talk with Damon using telepathy.

"I'm sorry if I startle you. I'm a friendly pokemon" Damon could see that Latias was telling the truth and calms down a bit. Latias smile.

"I am Latias. What's your name?" She ask him. "Damon" Damon replied. "Damon may I ask you for something?" said Latias.

"I guess so. What is it?" Damon ask. "I want to make you into a strong handsome Latios. Would you let me change you into a Latios?" said Latias.

What does Damon say?
11532.title: Latias

115321.content:
"Sure I'll be your Latios. If you tell me why you.want me to be your Latios or what a Latios is" said Damon. "Alright then I'll tell you everything"

Latias then tells Damon. "You see, Damon, I've lost my mate a long time ago and have been lonely for a while. When I heard about you. I wanted to make you my new mate so I wouldn't be lonely anymore. Latios is like me. Except there blue and there male only pokemon" said Latias.

"I see. Thank you for telling me. I'll be glad to be your mate so you won't have to be alone anymore. So now are you going to change me?" Damon ask her.

"I'll use my psychic powers to change you" Latias use her powers as her eyes glow a blue color as Damon's body glow.

When he stop glowing. Damon is now a Latios. Latias then felt faint as she fell. Damon quickly grab her as he lay her down on soft ground.

"I'll wait until she wakes up" Damon then tries his new body out.
115321.title: Sure I'll be your Latios

choices: One of his friends comes ovee.
1153211.content:
Latias then starts to wake up and finds Damon holding her in his arms. "Are you okay Latias?" Damon ask her. Latias just smile.

"I'm fine Damon" Damon and Latias then floats in the air. "So now what?" Damon ask her. "Now we go back to our new home" said Latias.

"Before we do. Can I say goodbye to my family and friends friends first?" Said Damon. "Sure Damon"

Damon and Latias then heads to Twinleaf town. They then get to Damon's house and sees no one was home.

"No ones home" said Damon. "Lets wait for then then. I want to see your home Damon" Damon then shows Latias his home.
1153211.title: Latias wakes up.

choices: The rest of their friends show up.
11532111.content:
As Damon and Latias waits for Damon's friends to come home. Damon's younger brother, Zach, comes home and find the two eon pokemon.

"Whoa a Latios and a Latias in my home" Damon use his new psychic powers to talk with his brother.

"Hello Zach" Zach reconize his older brothers voice. "Damon is that you?" Damon nods. "Wow your a pokemon now. How did that happen?"

Damon then tells him what happen to his meeting with Latias to what she wanted to do to him and his transformation into a Latios.

"'Is that what you want Damon?" Zach ask him. "It is Zach" said Damon. "Then I'm happy for the both of you. I'm glad you found someone you love"

Damon just smile. "Thanks Zach"
11532111.title: His brother comes home.

115321111.content:
Minutes later. The rest of their friends had show up who were surprise to see Damon in his new dragon body.

Damon told then what happen and they support his new life and mate. All except Jodi who was upset and jealous.

His mother returns as they say down and Damon was laying, on the couch, with his dragon mate, Latias, laying on his dragon body.

"Well Damon. I don't know what to say. Are you sure you want this?" She ask him. "Yes mom. I want to be with Latias" said Damon.

"If that's what you want. Then I'll support it. I'm glad your happy that you found someone special. Even if it is a legendary pokemon" said his mother.

"Damon honey. We should make it offical. Let's have a wedding" said Latias. "That's a great idea my love" said Damon.

"I shall prepare the wedding then and invite the whole family" said Damon's mom. "I should also invite some of my legendary friends as well" said Latias.

"Then it's offical. Let's make a wedding" said Damon.
115321111.title: The rest of their friends show up.

115331.content:
Damon was heading out from Twinleaf. He decided to leave Shino and visit other regions. He was going to Kanto first to find new Pokemon he hasn't seen yet.

As he starts to head to the docks. Mewtwo appears before him. This surprise Damon as he almost fell. "You are one of the humans with a pure heart. I've been looking for you." Said Mewtwo.

"Who are you?" Damon ask him. "I am Mewtwo. A clone of Mew. I need your help. But first what is your name?" Mewtwo ask Damon.

"Damon." Damon replied. "Damon will you help me out?" Said Mewtwo. "What do you need?" Said Damon. "I'm being hunted by the leader of Team Rocket. I can't face them by myself."

Damon has heard about them before. "If you agree to help me. I will change you into the most powerful psychic Pokemon. Me." Said Mewtwo.

Damon felt a little hesitant. Mewtwo sense it. "I will also allow you to maintain your human form as well. What do you say Damon?"

Mewtwo reach his hand out. Who was Damon not to past up this opportunity. "Alright Mewtwo. I accept." Damon takes Mewtwos hand. Mewtwo smile.

"Thank you Damon. Let's get you change then." Mewtwo concentrates his psychic powers over to Damon as Damon starts to change.
115331.title: Mewtwo

1153311.content:
Damon's body begins to change. His skin color starts to change into a grayish color. Two short blunt horns appear on top of his head.

His face change to a feline as his eyes turn purple. A tube then extands from the back, of his head, to the top of his spine. His hands and feet became three digit.

A long purple tail came out as his chest and shoulders become defined. Damon then felt a surge of psychic powers flow through him. Finishing his changes.

Damon looks over his new body and was in awe. "How do you feel Damon?" Mewtwo ask him. "I feel amazing and powerful Mewtwo." Said Damon.

"I'm glad you like it. We must be going now. Team Rocket set. Up their base somewhere in Kanto." Damon found it to be funny. He was heading to Kanto as well.

Damon and Mewtwo then flys off to Kanto.
1153311.title: Damon the Mewtwo.

115332.content:
Lugia begins his search for the humans with a pure heart. After hearing that there were five humans that have pure hearts. Lugia decided to make one of the humans his heir.

A few minuets later. He finds a male young human, Damon, who has a pure heart. "Arceus was right. His heart is pure. He'll make a great son for me"

Damon was out, by a lake, as he takes a break from his travels. He was about to go out, for a swim, when Lugia appears before the young human surprising Damon.

"Greeting's young human. I am Lugia. I have been looking for you" Damon was still surprise by this. But he quickly regains himself.

"Y-your looking for me? What did I do?" Damon ask. "Nothing really. But I do know that your heart is very pure and I want to ask you something" said Lugia.

"What is it?" said Damon. "How would you feel if I make you my son?" Lugia ask. "Become your son?" said Damon. "Yes I have always wanted a child for myself and continue my legacy. When I heard about you having a pure heart. I decided to seek you out. However if you agree. You must leave your old life behind. What do you say?" Lugia ask.

Damon starts to think about it. If he decided to become a son, to a legendary pokemon, then he'll have to leave his human life behind.

After thinking about it. Damon makes his decision. "I made my decision. I'll become your son" said Damon. Lugia smile. "Thank you human. What is your name?" Lugia ask.

"Damon" said Damon. "Well then Damon. Let's change you into a Lugia then" Lugia holds Damon, with his wings, and transfer his powers to him.

Damon then starts to change as well
115332.title: Lugia

choices: Damon trys his new body out
1153321.content:
Damon's body begins to white feathers all over his body. His feet then change into two toed feet. He then grew in size as he was now Lugia size. The lower part, of his body, grew blue feathers. His neck then grew long as blue mask goes over his eyes. Blue ridges then appears on his back. Lastly a long tail, with blue spikes, grew out from his behind.

When the changes were over. Damon was now a Lugia. Lugia looks over his new son. "Hmm this is strange" said Lugia. "What is Lugia?" Damon ask. "I was going to change you into a baby Lugia and raise you when your still young. But I guess this will,do for now. Are you ready to start your new life now my son?"said Lugia.

"I am Lugia" said Damon. "Please call me your dad or father. Your a Lugia now and my son and I'm going to teach you everything of how to be a Lugia like me" said Lugia. "Okay then dad." Lugia smile at his son. He was happy to have someone to continue his legacy when he's gone. "Right let's get going then. It's time you see,your new home and try out flying as well"

Lugia helps his new son with flying. The two Lugia then Flys off together.
1153321.title: Damon becomes an adult Lugia

12.content: Which legendary pokemon meets Zach
12.title: Zach

122.content:
Zach has been traveling all around the Shino and catching some new and rare pokemon. His older brother, Damon, had just defeated the shino champion and became the new champion.

"Damon has already become the new champion and is already a strong trainer already. *Sigh*" He then sit's down, on a rock, to take a break.

"Even if I do catch up to him. I don't think I can be strong as Damon is. I wish I could be a stronger one day and maybe one day I can beat Damon" said Zach.

"Is that right? You want to be a strong trainer?" Zach looks around and see who was talking to him. But he saw that no one was there.

"Who's there?" The legendary Cobalion then appears before Zach. "I am Cobalion and I heard what you were saying. Maybe I can help you" said Cobalion.

"You can make me a strong trainer?" Zach ask. "No I don't have the power. But I can make you into a strongest pokemon that ever live. Something that even your brother can't be" said Cobalion.

"Really? I always wanted to be a pokemon" said Zach. "I'll take that as a yes then. Tell me young human. What is your name?" Cobalion ask.

"It's Zach" said Zach. "Well then Zach. I will try to change you into either a steel type or a fighting type. Which one do you prefer?" Cobalion ask.

"Surprise me" said Zach. "Very well then" Cobalion then starts to use his powers. What pokemon, or pokemon type, did Zach change into?
122.title: Cobalion

1254.content:
Latios was out looking for one of the humans who had a pure heart. His sister, Latias, was doing the same.

"She'll probably make one of the humans into her mate. I have other plans when I find one of these humans."

After looking around a bit. Latios finds one of the pure hearted humans. It was Zach. Damon's younger brother.

Latios get's a good look at him. "I can feel it. His heart is pure. I finally found one. Now to make my move."

Zach had started his journey as a pokemon trainer. His goal is to beat his older brother Damon.

Damon had become the champion of Shino and he swore one day he'll become the new champion.

Zach hold the pokeball that contain his starter pokemon Chimchar. "Damon started with a Turtwig. So I'm going to start with a Chimchar."

Latios listen from a distance. "I'll find the strongest pokemon and beat my older brother."

Latios then spoke using telepathy. "Prehaps I can help with your goal." Zach then sees Latios and was stun.

"Whoa who are you?" He ask. "I am Latios. A psychic and dragon type. Now it's your turn. Who are you?" Said Latios.

"Zach. But wait. I think I heard from from Damon or the professor. Aren't there two of you?" Said Zach.

"Your refering to my sister Latias. She's also a psychic and dragon type like me. I couldn't help but overhear you talking. You wanted to beat your brother in a pokemon battle?" Said Latios.

"Yeah he's the champion of Shino before I started my journey as a pokemon trainer. I wanted to find some strong pokemon so I can beat him." Said Zach.

"Prehaps I can help you. I'll become one of your pokemon." Zach seem very excited. Having a legendary on his team.

"Really?" Latios nodded. "On one condition. You let me change you into either a dragon, or psychic type, pokemon and help me out." Said Latios.

"What do you need help with?" Zach ask. "I'll tell you later. So do we have a deal then Zach?"

Zach nods. "It's a deal Latios." Latios smile. "Good. Now I'll turn you into a pokemon while giving you the ability to change back into a human."

Latios shares his powers to Zach as he became a.
1254.title: Latios

13.content: Which legendary meets with Jodi?
13.title: Jodi

131.content:
Diancie had heard about the five humans with pure hearts and went to look for them. A few minuets later. Diancie finds one of the humans with a pure heart. Jodi.

"A human with a pure heart. So they do exist" Jodi was heading to TwinLeaf Town to meet up with Damon. She had a crush on him, for a long time, but she was too nervous to tell him how she feels for him.

"I wish there was a way I can tell Damon how I feel for him. I wonder if he will feel the same for me" said Jodi. "Maybe I can help you out"

Jodi then see's Diancie go up to her. "Who are you?" Jodi ask. "I am Diancie. I couldn't help but overheard you talking about someone you like"

Jodi then notice how beautiful Diancie look. "You really will help me" said Jodi. "But of course. I can change you into a beautiful Fairy type or Rock type" said Diancie.

"But Damon is a human" said Jodi. "Then we'll change him into a pokemon as well. Then you can tell him how you really feel for him" said Diancie.

"Can you really make me into a beautiful pokemon?" Jodi ask. "Just leave it to me. I'll use my powers to change you if you want me too" said Diancie.

Jodi then begins to think about and then gave Diancie her answer. "Alright Diancie I made up my mind. Change me into a beautiful pokemon" said Jodi.

"Okay then if that's what you wish" Diancie then use her powers and begins to change Jodi. But what did Jodi change into?
131.title: Diancie

1312.content:
Diancie changes Jodi into a fairy pokemon like...

A: A very cute Sylveon the fairy evolution of Eevee.

B: A elegant pokemon Gardevoir. (Yes, Damon as a Gallade would being a perfect couple.)

Or C: A adorable balloon pokemon Jigglypuff, because it's so cute and sings very beautiful.
1312.title: A fairy type

choices: Jodi the Sylveon enters the room
13121.content:
Jodi's body begins to grow pale cream color fur as it spreads all over her body. Her hands and feet then changes into her new paws as they change into pink color paws.

Jodi then felt a change in her spine as she falls on four legs. She then shrinks a few inches as she was now smaller then her normal size.

Two bows then appears on her left her and on her neck as two feelers adorns it. Her legs then becomes short and slender legs.

Her eyes then change blue as her pupils become white and no visible sclera. Her ears then went to the top of her head and become pointy.

Her teeth then become pointy as she now has two pointy teeth. Lastly a furry pinkish tail comes out from her behind and her changes were now finish. Jodi is now a Sylveon.

Jodi looks over her new body and doesn't recognize the pokmon she change into. "Diancie what pokemon did I change into?" Jodi ask.

"A Sylveon. It's the fairy evolution of Eevee and you look very cute as well" said Diancie. "Do you think Damon will think I'm cute as well?" said Jodi.

"Sure when we change him into a Sylveon like you" After being change into a Sylveon. Jodi and Diancie makes it to Twin Leaf Town and enters Damon's house.

"They find Damon sleeping in his bed. "Oh he's very handsome for a human. I can see why you like him" Jodi begins to blush.

"Diancie can you change Damon into a Sylveon for me? I don't know how to use my new powers yet" said Jodi. "Sure Jodi" Diancie use her powers to change Damon.

A few minuets later. Damon wakes up and feels weird. He get's out of bed and finds himself standing on four legs and realize he was much smaller now.

"What happen to me?" I feel so weird" He then notice a feeler and removes it. He realize he had paws now and was shock by this.

"P-paws? I have paws" He then goes to the mirror and see's a cute Sylveon looking at him. He was shock to see he was that Sylveon.

"I-I've been change into a pokemon. But what pokemon did I change into?" said Damon
13121.title: Sylveon

choices: Something goes wrong with the transformation
13122.content:
First Jodi's turns white as her lower body changes as it now resembles a slim gown with a green underside. Her legs then become white slender legs.

Her hair then changes into a green color that curls down to her sides. A red fin like horn then appears and extends from her chest.

Spikes then appear on the side of her face as it resembles a masquerade mask. Her arms then turns green as her fingers becomes long and slender.

More spikes then appear on her back as it becomes round and extended. Lastly a band of green appears on her chest as it connects to her sleeve like arms.

A few changes later and Jodi was now a Gardevoir. Jodi looks over her new body. "Wow I did a great job didn't I? Her new psychic and fairy powers then arrives. She smiles at Diancie.

"Diancie thank you for this new body. I now feel confident to tell Damon how I feel" said Jodi. "That's good Jodi. I'll go with you for support"

After being change into a Gardevoir. Jodi and Diancie arrive at Twin Leaf Town and finds Damon waiting for Jodi to come visit

Jodi approach Damon as Damon looks at her. "Whoa a Gardevoir. Never expect to see one" said Damon. "Gardevoir"

Jodi use her new psychic powers and lifts Damon. "W-what are you?" She then begins to change him.
13122.title: Gardevoir

131221.content:
Damon's body then starts to change as Jodi starts to concentrate. His body starts to change white as his hips becomes rounded.

His legs then becomes stronger. His torso then becomes a green thin torso with sharp red horns sticking out of his chest and back.

His arms then becomes then begins to shape into tonfas with extendable blades in his elbows. His head then begins to resemble a gladiator's helmet as his face changes into white and with a teal head as well.

Spikes then appears on the side of his face. A few changes later and Damon was now a Gallade. Jodi put's him down as Damon looks over his new body.

"I-I'm a Gallade" He was surprise by this. He looks at Jodi. "Why?" said Damon. "Do you like it Damon?" Damon then notice Jodi's voice.

"Jodi? Your a Gardevior?" Damon ask. "Yes thanks to Diancie" Jodi then points to Diancie. "Why are you Gardevoir then?" Damon.

"To tell you how I really feel for you Damon. Diancie thought if I was change into a beautiful pokemon. I might be able to tell you. But you'll had to change into a pokemon as well. It's my first time changing you. So Damon. I want to say I love you"

Damon was stun. "You love me?" said Damon. "Yes Damon. I always felt a little shy from telling you. But now that I'm a pokemon. I feel confident. Tell me Damon. Do you feel the same?"

Damon didn't know what to say. Then new feelings and emotions, for Jodi, starts to swell up. He begins to realize he felt the same. Damon smile.

"Yes Jodi. I love you too" Damon and Jodi then hold each other as they share their first kiss. "Aw you two make a cute couple" said Diancie.

"So now that were pokemon. What do we do now?" Jodi ask. "Guess we should start our new lives together and find a new home" said Damon
131221.title: Damon changes into a Gallade

1313.content:
Diancie decides to change Jodi into a rock type pokemon, and not just a rock type but a ice type as well. That's right, Diancie is going to change her into a Aurorus, because its the only beautiful rock type pokemon that Diancie knowns. (except herself of course) But it will much power to change Jodi into a Aurorus. Did Diancie will success or....

A: Diancie changes Jodi into Aurorus with success.

B: Diancie doesn't use enough power and the result Jodi changes into a Corsola. Well it at least cute, but did Jodi is going to being okay with this?

Or C: Diancie has use too much power and the result it changes Jodi into Onix the largest rock type pokemon that could been intimidate. How Jodi will reacts after the mistake of Diancie?
1313.title: A Rock type

13131.content:
Jodi's body then starts to turn blue as Diancie continues to change her into a beautiful Aurorus. Her underside then becomes a little lighter.

Her hands and feet then change into her new three claw toes. Jodi then felt a sudden shift, in her spine, as she falls on four legs.

Jodi then grew taller as she was now 8"10 and 2.7m of height as she now weighs 496.0 lbs and 225 kg. Her face then changes into her new dinosaur snout.

Two lines of small ice crystals then begins to run to the length of her body. A white v shape mark then covers the top of her head with another Ice Crystal in the center.

Her neck then grows longer. Two large flowing sails then appears as it extends from the top of her head and it runs down her long neck.

Lastly a long tapering tail then comes out from her behind as her changes where finish. Diancie looks over Jodi and was happy with her work.

"I did it. I made you into an Aurorus" said Diancie. "What's a Aurorus?" Jodi ask. "A beautiful rock and ice type pokemon. But now as beautiful as me"

Jodi then finds a water and looks into her reflection. "I. I look beautiful. Thank you Diancie" Diancie just nods. "Now we just need to change Damon into an Aurorus, like you, and the two of you can be together"

Suddenly they heard a voice. "Jodi? Jodi are you here?" Jodi recognize the voice. "It's Damon" said Jodi. "Now's our chance to change him"

Damon then finds Diancie and Jodi. "Aw cool. Rare pokemon. I think I should capture them" Jodi decided she was going to change Damon with her new body and power.

"Hope I do this right" She then launches an ice type attack. Damon then felt cold. "W-what was that f-for?" Suddenly he didn't feel cold as he starts to change.

Did Damon become an Aurorus? Or does he only change into it's pre evolved form?
13131.title: Aurorus

choices: They look for a new home themselves
131311.content:
Damon then starts to begin to glow a blue color as he starts to change. Jodi hopes she did it right and that Damon will be an Aurorus like her.

In a few hours. The changes were now finish and Damon had been change into an Aurorus like Jodi. Jodi was happy she change Damon into the same pokemon as her.

Damon looks over his new body and was surprise. "I-I've been change into a pokemon. I look like you now. Why did you change me?" Damon ask.

"Do you like it Damon? I change you into a pokemon so you can be with me" said Jodi. "What makes you think I want to be with-"

Suddenly Damon stops and recognize Jodi's voice. "Wait Jodi is that really you?" Damon ask. "It is Damon. Do you like my new form?"

Damon get's a closer look at her new form. "You do look more beautiful" Jodi blush. "Thanks Damon. I ask Diancie to change me into a beautiful pokemon after I met her. Well actually she told me and I agree to be change into a pokemon" said Jodi.

"But why?" Damon ask. "For this" Jodi then suddenly plants a surprise kiss on Damon's lips. Damon was surprise and yet he enjoy it as he kiss back.

Diancie just watches the couple kissing. The two stop kissing. "I love you Damon. I have love you for a very long time now" said Jodi.

"I feel the same thing for you Jodi" said Damon. "You two make a perfect couple. Now we need to find you a place to live. Somewhere cold" said Diancie.

"Someplace where no other trainers can find us" said Damon. "Then we better find a place then. I'm sure there was a cold place somewhere in the Shino region" said Jodi.

"There's also one in Kalos. I can take you there myself. But we might need a psychic pokemon to teleport us there It's your choice though" said Diancie.
131311.title: Damon changes into an Aurorus.

134.content:
Jodi was on her way to some old ruins where Damon is waiting. He has heard that there were some rare pokemon to find and wants to finds and catch one.

Jodi said she'll meet him there and Damon told her where to find the ruins. Jodi was now, in a clearing, and sat down to relax.

"All Damon could think of is catching some pokemon. He had defeated the champion, Cynthia, and became the new champion. If only he could pay attention to what's important. Me"

Suddenly Reshriam appears and Jodi was surprise and frightin by the giant dragon. "Ah don't hurt me" Jodi said to fire dragon.

"It's alright. I'm not going to hurt you. I do apologize if I scared you. I couldn't help but overheard you talking. It seems you care for this human" said Reshriam.

"I do yes" said Jodi. "I check him out. He has a pure heart like you. He was in the old dragon ruins. Humans only go there if they want to see what it would be like to be a dragon type pokemon. But it can only work if a legendary dragon type pokemon helps change them" said Reshriam.

"So what does that mean?" said Jodi. "I want to help you if you wish and win the heart of the young trainer you fell in love with" said Reshriam.

"You will?" Jodi felt excited. "Yes but it will mean given up your humanity" said Reshriam. "I'll do it. Whatever it takes to be with Damon" said Jodi.

"Very well then. I am Reshriam and you?" Reshriam ask. "Jodi" Jodi replied. "Jodi hop on. I'll take you to the old ruins myself"

Jodi then get's on Reshriam and Reshriam fly's off at high speeds as Jodi hangs on. A few minuets later. They make it to the old ruins.

"I'll go inside. Make sure you, and this other human, are there when I change you both" Jodi nods and Reshriam left as Jodi meets with Damon.

"Jodi you made it. Wow I thought it might take you longer to get here" said Damon. "Well I'm here alright. So are you ready to do some exploring?" Jodi ask.

"You bet I am" Damon and Jodi then goes into the old ruins. They manage to get into the deepest part of the ruins and finds many dragon type pokemon statues.

"Wow check out these statues" Reshriam then appears before the young trainers. "Whoa check it out Jodi. It's a rare pokemon. I'm going to catch it"

Jodi stops him as Reshriam surrounds the whole room with flames. "W-what's going on here?" Damon and Jodi where then engulf by the flames.

But it didn't hurt or burn them as it starts to change them. What do they change into?
134.title: Reshiram

choices: Something goes wrong. Jodi becomes something else.
13532.content:
Latias went to find one of the humans who has a pure heart as she was also holding a soul dew as well.

She then comes upon Jodi a young girl with a pure heart. "She must be one of the humans with a pure heart."

Latias tries to get closer to her. Jodi was off to Hearthome City. She's meeting a friend that she loves. But she was too shy to tell him.

"I want to tell Damon how I feel about him. But I'm a little nervous. What should I do?"

That's when she heard a voice. "I can help you." She turns around and sees Latias. She couldn't help but notice how beautiful she was.

" Your a Latias. How can you help me?" She ask Latias. "Easy I'll change you into a Latias. Then you can tell him how you feel about him." Said Latias.

" What about Damon?" Jodi ask her. "Simple. We'll change him into a Latios. Then the two of you can be together. What do you say?"

Jodi thinks about it and makes her decision. "Alright Latias. I'll change into you." Said Jodi. "I figure you will."

Latias holds Jodis arms. "I never change a human before. So I hope this goes well." Latias uses her psychic/dragon powers as it goes to Jodi

Jodi begins to feel her body changing as she starts to glow.
13532.title: Latias

info.brief_description: A story where five friends meet different legendary pokemon
info.description: It has been said legendary pokemon only show themselves to humans who have pure hearts and let's themselves get capture. But it's different this time. The legendary pokemon are looking for humans for either taking their place, make them their new playmates or make them their mates. Five long time friends where about to meet these legendary pokemon. This is the last story I'm going to use these characters.
